Posts.Content: Hi, My friend had got breast cancer in last 2002 and she is now aware of breast  cancer u can be also thats not give to much pain but giving to much tension about cancer. so don't take it on your mind just follow doctors instructions and you will be definitely pass this time without tension. OK Best of luck. Breast Cancer - http://Bodyhealthdebate.co.uk   " No matter how alone you feel in this world, there are always people who care for you."
Posts.Title: Treatment for metastatic breast cancer, now in the brain
